data.lyric:
[ti:Shut Up About Politics]
[ar:John Rich/The Five]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Shut Up About Politics - John Rich/The Five
[00:07.79]Shut up about politics
[00:11.32]Ain't nothing but a big pile of dirty tricks
[00:15.13]I'm tired of all the fighting and the b***hing fits
[00:18.13]So shut up about politics
[00:22.57]You punch left I punch right
[00:25.54]We're caught up in the middle of a deep swamp fight
[00:29.50]Some people lie some people steal
[00:32.75]And everybody's talking 'bout the great new deal
[00:35.97]Shut up about politics
[00:39.49]Ain't nothing but a big pile of dirty tricks
[00:43.24]I'm tired of all the fighting and the b***hing fits
[00:46.39]So shut up about politics
[00:57.76]All this person carrying on
[01:01.41]It's been going on a little too long
[01:04.52]But I got something to fix us all up
[01:07.83]Take a shot of my whiskey from a big red cup
[01:11.23]Shut up about politics
[01:14.86]Ain't nothing but a big pile of dirty tricks
[01:18.65]I'm tired of all the fighting and the b***hing fits
[01:21.73]So shut up about politics
[01:39.55]Shut up about politics
[01:42.94]Ain't nothing but a big pile of dirty tricks
[01:46.56]I'm tired of all the fighting and the b***hing fits
[01:49.96]So shut up about politics
[01:53.52]Shut up about politics
[01:57.01]Ain't nothing but a big pile of dirty tricks
[02:00.98]I'm tired of all the fighting and the b***hing fits
[02:04.00]So shut up about politics
[02:07.68]Shut up about politics
[02:11.00]So shut up about politics
data.trans:
[ti:Shut Up About Politics]
[ar:John Rich/The Five]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.79]不谈政事
[00:11.32]政坛里充斥着卑鄙的伎俩
[00:15.13]我不想再听见争吵声和抱怨声
[00:18.13]所以不谈政事
[00:22.57]你一拳 我一拳
[00:25.54]我们卷入了一场无止境的争斗
[00:29.50]有人谎话连篇 有人暗箱操作
[00:32.75]每个人都在谈论伟大的新政
[00:35.97]不谈政事
[00:39.49]政坛里充斥着卑鄙的伎俩
[00:43.24]我不想再听见争吵声和抱怨声
[00:46.39]所以不谈政事
[00:57.76]那些还在坚持的人
[01:01.41]早已疲惫到极点
[01:04.52]但我有办法可以让你解脱
[01:07.83]端起红色的大酒杯 将威士忌一饮而尽
[01:11.23]不谈政事
[01:14.86]政坛里充斥着卑鄙的伎俩
[01:18.65]我不想再听见争吵声和抱怨声
[01:21.73]所以不谈政事
[01:39.55]不谈政事
[01:42.94]政坛里充斥着卑鄙的伎俩
[01:46.56]我不想再听见争吵声和抱怨声
[01:49.96]所以不谈政事
[01:53.52]不谈政事
[01:57.01]政坛里充斥着卑鄙的伎俩
[02:00.98]我不想再听见争吵声和抱怨声
[02:04.00]所以不谈政事
[02:07.68]不谈政事
[02:11.00]所以不谈政事
